name: repo-project-sync-workflow
description: KINTSUGI repo-to-project sync workflow: Always edit main repo (/blue/maigan/smith6jt/KINTSUGI/) first, then sync to project folders. Trigger: editing Kdecon, Kstitch, Kreg, Kview2 modules; fix not working after edit; syncing between repos; KINTSUGI_Projects folder edits.
